Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.persistence

Class SaveGame

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.persistence.SaveGame
public class SaveGame
extends java.lang.Object
Save the current game states like map, inventory, level info and time. Export as an formatted .json file.
Author:
Biru
